name: Music Road: Video Game Song
description:
Music road game for under, tale, five night, miner craft, bendy, and video game fans
Let's roll the ball and feel the beat in this Color Music road game!

Features:
Hold and drag control, easy to play.
Breathtaking 3D effects.
Unlimited Speed Run game.
Update video game songs and Different backgrounds weekly.
Amazing sound quality – music smooth with your finger.

Game rules:
Enjoy your favorite video game music and guide the ball to match other same color balls altogether. Collect the coins and Gift Boxes to unlock new songs. Follow the rhythm of addictive challenges designed for your eyes cause speed increase in next round and never stop.

DISCLAIMER:
Music road game is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by games or films management, or record label.
This app does not include any copyrighted material.
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions, with your comments, we can add more songs and make better games ever! Thank you for download game! And Have fun!Ball Jump 3D game for under, tale, five night, miner craft, bendy, and video game fans
